partnerInfo.title: Reach, engage and transact with chinese tourists
partnerInfo.load.message: Congratulations on your decision to be part of the worlds fastest growing market, the outbound Chinese tourist. We would like to step you through a few easy steps to help you choose the plan that is right for you.
partnerInfo.subtitle: Let's Start with some of the basics
partnerInfo.bussiness.name: What is your business name
partnerInfo.bussiness.placeholder.name: Freffy's BBQ Joint
partnerInfo.bussiness.tip.name: Tip: If you have more than one business, you can always add later
partnerInfo.bussiness.error.name: Please provide your Business Name!
partnerInfo.bussiness.mobile.error: Please input your Business or Mobile Number!
partnerInfo.bussiness.btype: What best descibes your type of business
partnerInfo.bussiness.nbSite: Number of sites you would like to market
partnerInfo.bussiness.nbSite.tip: TIP: uwai.com is a map based service to allow Chinese tourists to find you easily.  Each location you would like to market must be individually listed
